name: Highway '55
description:
The day is July 24th, 1955.

In sleepy Montana town just off of Highway 55 some white supremacist stole your dog. This is a time for vigilantes. Time to get your dog back.

Our submission for https://itch.io/jam/bw-jam .

This car combat game was made in just two weeks and takes heavy inspiration from games like Interstate '76 and Twisted Metal.

See screenshot for default controls, these can be changed in game.
